languages.text: {n}Голос Паскаля холоден.{/n} "Некоторые директивы взаимодействия с ксенорасами рекомендуют утилизировать любой персонал категорией ниже магоса, побывавший в плену нелюдей. Предательство единицы Ахиллеас указывает на обоснованность данных рекомендаций. Фиксирую свершенную ошибку".

{n}Pasqal's voice is cold.{/n} "Some directives for interacting with xenoraces prescribe disposing of all personnel below the rank of Magos who have been in non-human captivity. The unit Achilleas's treachery speaks to the merit of these recommendations. Registering the error."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Паскаля холоден.{/n} "Некоторые директивы взаимодействия с ксенорасами рекомендуют утилизировать любой персонал категорией ниже магоса, побывавший в плену нелюдей. Предательство единицы Ахиллеас указывает на обоснованность данных рекомендаций. Фиксирую свершенную ошибку".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's voice is cold.{/n} "Some directives for interacting with xenoraces prescribe disposing of all personnel below the rank of magos who have been in non-human captivity. The unit Achilleas's treachery speaks to the merit of these recommendations. I am noting the mistake that was made."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的声音很冷漠。{/n}“与异形种族互动的相关指令规定，凡是贤者级别以下、被非人类生物囚禁过的成员，都要统统处决。阿吉里亚斯这一单位的背叛行为证明了这些建议的可靠之处。正在注册这一错误。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice is cold.{/n} "Some directives for interacting with xenoraces prescribe disposing of all personnel below the rank of Magos who have been in non-human captivity. The unit Achilleas's treachery speaks to the merit of these recommendations. Registering the error."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的声音很冷漠。{/n}“与异形种族互动的相关指令规定，凡是贤者级别以下、被非人类生物囚禁过的成员，都要统统处决。阿吉里亚斯这一单位的背叛行为证明了这些建议的可靠之处。正在注册这一错误。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz de Pasqal es fría.{/n} «Alguna directivas para el trato con razas xenos ordenan la eliminación de todo personal con rango inferior a magos que haya estado en cautiverio por parte de no humanos. La traición de la unidad Achilleas confirma lo acertado de las recomendaciones. Registrado el error».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice is cold.{/n} "Some directives for interacting with xenoraces prescribe disposing of all personnel below the rank of Magos who have been in non-human captivity. The unit Achilleas's treachery speaks to the merit of these recommendations. Registering the error."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Pasqal es fría.{/n} «Alguna directivas para el trato con razas xenos ordenan la eliminación de todo personal con rango inferior a magos que haya estado en cautiverio por parte de no humanos. La traición de la unidad Achilleas confirma lo acertado de las recomendaciones. Registrado el error».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルの声は冷たい。{/n}「異種族との交流に関するいくつかの指令では、非人間の囚われの身となったマゴス以下の人員はすべて処分するよう定めている。アキレアスユニットの裏切りが、この勧告の有益性を物語っている。エラーを登録中」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice is cold.{/n} "Some directives for interacting with xenoraces prescribe disposing of all personnel below the rank of Magos who have been in non-human captivity. The unit Achilleas's treachery speaks to the merit of these recommendations. Registering the error."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの声は冷たい。{/n}「異種族との交流に関するいくつかの指令では、非人間の囚われの身となったマゴス以下の人員はすべて処分するよう定めている。アキレアスユニットの裏切りが、この勧告の有益性を物語っている。エラーを登録中」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Stimme ist kalt.{/n} "Einige Direktiven für die Interaktion mit Xenovölkern schreiben die Beseitigung sämtlichen Personals unter dem Rang eines Magos vor, das sich in nicht-menschlicher Gefangenschaft befand. Der Verrat der Einheit Achilleas ist ein Beleg für den Wert dieser Empfehlungen. Der Fehler wird registriert."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice is cold.{/n} "Some directives for interacting with xenoraces prescribe disposing of all personnel below the rank of Magos who have been in non-human captivity. The unit Achilleas's treachery speaks to the merit of these recommendations. Registering the error."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Stimme ist kalt.{/n} "Einige Direktiven für die Interaktion mit Xenovölkern schreiben die Beseitigung sämtlichen Personals unter dem Rang eines Magos vor, das sich in nicht-menschlicher Gefangenschaft befand. Der Verrat der Einheit Achilleas ist ein Beleg für den Wert dieser Empfehlungen. Der Fehler wird registriert."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix de Pasqal est froide.{/n} « Certaines directives d'interaction avec les espèces xénos préconisent de se défaire du personnel d'un rang inférieur à celui de magos ayant passé du temps en captivité aux mains de non humains. La trahison de l'unité Achilleas démontre les mérites de ces recommandations. Enregistrement de l'erreur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice is cold.{/n} "Some directives for interacting with xenoraces prescribe disposing of all personnel below the rank of Magos who have been in non-human captivity. The unit Achilleas's treachery speaks to the merit of these recommendations. Registering the error."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Pasqal est froide.{/n} « Certaines directives d'interaction avec les espèces xénos préconisent de se défaire du personnel d'un rang inférieur à celui de magos ayant passé du temps en captivité aux mains de non humains. La trahison de l'unité Achilleas démontre les mérites de ces recommandations. Enregistrement de l'erreur. »

languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice is cold.{/n} "Some directives for interacting with xenoraces prescribe disposing of all personnel below the rank of Magos who have been in non-human captivity. The unit Achilleas's treachery speaks to the merit of these recommendations. Registering the error."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesi soğuk geliyor.{/n} "Zeno ırklara ilişkin direktiflerin bazılarında, insan dışıların tutsağı konumunda bulunan ve Magos rütbesinin altındaki tüm personelin ortadan kaldırılması salık verilir. Achilleas biriminin ihaneti, bu önerilerin doğruluğunu işaret etmekte. Hatayı kaydediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice is cold.{/n} "Some directives for interacting with xenoraces prescribe disposing of all personnel below the rank of Magos who have been in non-human captivity. The unit Achilleas's treachery speaks to the merit of these recommendations. Registering the error."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesi soğuk.{/n} "Zeno ırklara ilişkin direktiflerin bazılarında, insan dışıların tutsağı konumunda bulunan ve Magos rütbesinin altındaki tüm personelin ortadan kaldırılması salık verilir. Achilleas biriminin ihaneti bu önerilerin doğruluğuna işaret etmekte. Hata kayda geçiliyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
